title: Gemstone Bug
body:
On this account (CycloneMike, NA), while opening a chest in queue, I unlocked Orianna and a gemstone. I click the orange button to accept the Orianna champion shard, but for the gemstone, I can't press it because the queue pop'ed and I entered game with a party. After the game, the Orianna shard was still there, but the gemstone wasn't.
Can this please be looked into? There may be other bugs involving people using Hextech Crafting while in queue, or maybe it was just a one time glitch that honestly isn't that big of a deal for me. Thanks!

replies.body: Just restart client, it pops back after a while, just hiding
Also you should probably submit a support ticket for these kinds of things {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Was it essence rather than a gem? Essence that was added to your stockpile?

Also, you're way off target buddy, bug reports are done on the NA boards. You know, where you should be posting anyway.
